display_long_description:
LAX VR is the ultimate first-person VR lacrosse experience, offering both Box and Field lacrosse modes, including an exhilarating 6v6 field game where you can play as a field player, long pole, or goalie. Game modes include: Field, Box, Braveheart, Shooting, Goalie, Longstick, Shoot Around, and Wall Ball. Our Medicine Game pays tribute to the Indigenous roots of lacrosse, set in a mythical historic environment. Hone your skills, customize your twig, and enjoy the immersive world of VR lacrosse. Start a box or field 6v6 tourney and aim for the Championship!

The latest release adds a new expansion (IAP) with 10v10 field play, featuring a Coaches Mode. Change middie lines, call timeouts, manage the tempo, and yell at refs in this added mode. Note: Expansion is a separate purchase from the base game.

Unique touch controller physics replicate the feel of a real lacrosse stick, and as a family-friendly game with a one-time cost, there are no hidden fees. Compete globally on the leaderboards to compare skills and aim for the top.

LAX VR delivers a fun, realistic lacrosse experience. Practice your skills in various modes, and customize your twig with colors for max style!
